sent.orig: Economic structure includes industrial structure, product structure, technology structure, distribution structure, organization structure to wait.
sent.trans: 经济结构包括产业结构、产品结构、技术结构、布局结构、组织结构等。

sent.orig: From the syntax structure, Predicate complement Structure consists of structure component, structure form, structure connection, etc.
sent.trans: 从句法结构上来看，述补结构的构成包括结构成分、结构形式、结构关系等几个方面。

sent.orig: Main types of enterprises' organizational structure include simple structure structure, business-unit-structure, subsidiary-structure and matrix.
sent.trans: 企业组织结构的类型主要包括简单结构、职能制、事业部制、子公司制和矩阵制。

sent.orig: The ordinary structure system adopted in multi-story steel structure has three forms: framed-structure-braced framed-structure and truss-structure.
sent.trans: 多层钢结构常用的结构体系有框架体系、框架支撑体系和桁架体系。

sent.orig: The structure of patriotism education includes structure of arrangement of ideas, content structure and process structure.
sent.trans: 爱国主义教育结构包括层次结构、内容结构和过程结构等三个方面。
